	trait = faith_warrior

		birth = yes
	}
	1010.1.1 = {
		employer = 144125
	}
	1028.1.1 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

ghaznavid_generals_3 = {
	name = "Maroofuddin"
	dynasty = afghan_salar
	culture = afghan
	religion = maturidi
	father = ghaznavid_generals_1
	trait = faith_warrior
	986.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	1015.1.1 = {
		employer = 144125
	}
	1017.1.1 = {
		death = {
			death_reason = death_battle
		}
	}
}

ghaznavid_generals_4 = { #local Muslim saint in Satrikh in India. The legends insist he was a Sayyid, descendant of Ali, but I find that highly doubtful.
	name = "Masud"
	dynasty = afghan_salar
	culture = afghan
	religion = maturidi
	father = ghaznavid_generals_2
	mother = extra_ghaznavids_7
	trait = faith_warrior
	trait = saint #he seems to have been venerated already in the Middle Ages
	1015.2.4 = { #historically accurate, it seems
		birth = yes
	}
	1029.1.1 = {
		employer = 144125
	}
	1033.6.14 = { #historically accurate, it seems
		death = {
			death_reason = death_martyrdom
		}
	}
}

####################################### Dynasty: shah_mirid #######################################
shah_mir = {
	name = "Shams_ud-Din"
	dynasty = shah_mirid
	religion = maturidi
	culture = afghan
	trait = zealous #So that he won't be converted
	trait = ambitious #To make it more likely he will try to seize power
	trait = education_martial_3
	1300.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
		add_pressed_claim = title:k_kashmir
		add_pressed_claim = title:c_kasmira
		effect = {
			learn_language_of_culture = culture:kashmiri
		}
	}
	1342.1.1 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

shah_mir_son_1 = {
	name = "Jamshid"

		birth = yes
	}
	1347.1.1 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

32901 = {
	name = "al-Qaim"
	dynasty_house = house_Fatimid
	trait = ubaydi #Fatimid Sayyid
	diplomacy = 7
	martial = 9       # Increased from 6 - he was primarily a military commander who led multiple campaigns
	stewardship = 6   # Reduced from 7 - faced major rebellions and administrative challenges
	intrigue = 5
	learning = 7
	religion = "ismaili"
	culture = "maghrebi"
	trait = education_martial_3
	trait = brave     # Keeping - personally led military campaigns and held out during siege of al-Mahdiya
	trait = ambitious # Replacing temperate - his persistent attempts to conquer Egypt despite failures
	trait = stubborn  # Replacing arrogant - his persistence in failed Egyptian campaigns and holding out during year-long siege
	trait = zealous   # Keeping - as both Ismaili Imam and caliph, religious conviction was central to his identity
	father = 32900
	893.1.1 = {
		birth = "893.1.1"
	}
	944.1.1 = {

	name = "al-Hakim"
	dynasty_house = house_Fatimid
	trait = ubaydi #Fatimid Sayyid
	martial = 3        # Reduced - not primarily a military leader
	diplomacy = 4
	intrigue = 8
	stewardship = 6
	learning = 7       # Increased - involved in religious scholarship and jurisprudence
	religion = "ismaili"
	culture = "egyptian"
	trait = zealous    # His extreme religious fervor and promotion of Islamic law
	trait = arbitrary  # His notorious unpredictable and contradictory edicts
	trait = paranoid   # His suspicion and persecution of Christians, Jews, and various groups
	trait = lunatic_1  # Keep existing - fits his erratic behavior that contemporaries saw as madness
	trait = education_learning_3  # Changed from martial - better fits his focus on religious matters
	trait = chaste
	father = 3090
	985.1.1 = {
		birth = "985.1.1"
	}
	1005.1.1 = {
		add_trait = scholar  # Founded Dar al-Ilm (House of Wisdom) in Cairo, became patron of learning
	}
	1009.1.1 = {
		add_trait = kinslayer_1  # Around this time he executed many officials and family members in his purges
	}
	1018.1.1 = {
		add_trait = lifestyle_mystic  # In his later years, he withdrew regularly for meditation and spiritual contemplation
	}

		death = yes
	}

3200 = {
	name = "Abd-al-Rahman" #Abd al-Rahman (III) ibn Muhammad, Muwalladi Caliph (929-961), Sultan of Andalusia (912-961) & Sheik of Alarcon, Alarcos, Algeciras, Almeria, Cabra, Calatrava, Castelo Branco, Cordoba, Ibiza, Mallorca, Menorca & Niebla (912-961), Jaén (913-961), Faro & Silves (920-961), Malagon & Moura (930-961), Malaga (931-961) & Sevilla (937-961)
	dynasty_house = house_Umawi
	martial = 7        # Increased from 6 - successful early military campaigns, though became more cautious after Simancas
	diplomacy = 7
	intrigue = 6       # Increased from 4 - successfully centralized power and managed complex political situations
	stewardship = 9    # Increased from 5 - generated massive revenues, built Madinat al-Zahra, excellent administrator
	religion = muwalladi
	culture = andalusian
	trait = calm       # Keeping existing - fits his measured, strategic approach
	trait = ambitious  # His drive to declare himself Caliph and expand Umayyad power to its zenith
	trait = diligent   # Kept meticulous daily records for 50 years, excellent at administrative details
	trait = administrator  # His exceptional skill at organizing the state and building bureaucracy
	trait = quraysh    # Keeping existing
	trait = education_stewardship_4  # Keeping existing
	father = 73686 #Muhammad ibn Abdallah (levantine.txt)
	mother = basque0148 #Muzna (basque.txt)
	trait = child_of_concubine_female  # Keeping existing
	891.1.7 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	913.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = levantine0086 #Fatima bint al-Mundir (levantine.txt)
	}
	914.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = andalusian0033 #Maryam
	}
	929.1.16 = {
		add_trait = august  # Added when he declares himself Caliph, representing his imperial status and authority
	}
	950.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = levantine0087 #Mustaq (levantine.txt)
	}
	961.10.15 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

	sexuality = bisexual
	disallow_random_traits = yes
	1001.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			add_character_flag = no_headgear
			set_landless_government_effect = yes
			add_trait_xp = {
				trait = violet_poet
				value = {
					integer_range = {
						min = 70
						max = 80
					}
				}
			}
			add_gold = 1200 #Inherited her father's remaining wealth.
			add_prestige_level = 2
			add_character_flag = special_laamp_char
			add_character_flag = do_not_generate_starting_family
		}
	}
	1030.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			create_character_memory = {
				type = had_sex
				participants = {
					sex_partner = character:andalusian_0004
				}
			}
		}
	}

	}

	trait = generous   # Famous for lavish gifts to courtiers and charity to the needy

	}
}

1500001 = {
	name="Daghfal" #Daghfal b. al-Jarrah al-Tayyi, Highly speculated to be the Same as Hasan b. al-Jarrah who led a Qarmati attack on Palestine in 972. Was bribed to switch sides during the planned follow-up expedition to Egypt in 974, disappears from records shortly after this
	dynasty_house = house_jarrahi
	religion="qarmatian" #The Jarrah leaders of the Tayy confederacy were mentioned as Qarmatian allies, before arriving in Palestine
	culture="bedouin"
	father=1500000
	923.1.1={
		birth=yes
	}
	974.1.1={
		religion="ismaili"
	}
	976.1.1={
		death=yes
	}
}

1500002 = {
	name="Mufarrij" #Mufarrij b. Daghfal b. al-Jarrah al-Tayyi, famous Jarrahid Emir of Palestine with a very independent streak. Proved a very turbulent vassal who vacillated between submission and open revolt against the Fatimids. He even formed a short-lived Bedouin Caliphate based from Ramlah led by the Alid Abu'l-Futuh
	dynasty_house = house_jarrahi
	religion="qarmatian" #The Jarrah leaders of the Tayy confederacy were mentioned as Qarmatian allies, before arriving in Palestine
	culture="bedouin"
	father=1500001
	958.1.1={
		birth=yes
	}
	974.1.1={
		religion="ismaili"
	}
	1011.1.1={
		religion="ismaili"
	}
	1013.1.1={
		death=yes
	}
}

1500003 = {
	name="Hassan" #Hassan b. Mufarrij, continued the independent streak of his father, allied with the Kalb and Kalbids in the 1020'ies unifying the Bedouins of the Syrian Steppe and Desert in oposition against outside rule, later allied with the Byzzies. Was allowed to re-enter Palestine and resume his governorship in the 1040'ies when conflict between the Byzzies and the Fatimids had ended
	dynasty_house = house_jarrahi
	religion="ismaili"
	culture="bedouin"
	father=1500002
	987.1.1={
		birth=yes
	}
	1011.1.1={
		religion="ismaili"
	}
	1013.1.1={
		religion="ismaili"
	}
	1044.1.1={
		death=yes
	}
}

1500006 = {
	name="Hazim" #Hazim b. Ali b. Mufarrij, little info on him. Known for his participation in the Alid attempt to capture Damascus in 1065/66. Received a pardon afterwards. Known to have sired sons, Badr and al-Rabiah, the latter sired the leaders of most Arab tribes in the Syrian Desert/Steppe area between the 13th and the 17th Century, these branches had virtual monopoly over the title of Amir-al-Arab (Commander of the Arabs) in the Ayyubid period within the Ayyubid state. Later monopolized amongst the Fadl family only in the Mamluk state.
	dynasty_house = house_jarrahi
	religion="ismaili"
	culture="bedouin"
	father=1500004

	}
	1079.1.1={
		death=yes
	}
}

8000464 = {
	name="Husam al-Din" #Husam al-Din Turuntay
	dynasty=8000564
	religion="ashari"
	culture="cuman"
	trait="arrogant"
	trait="gregarious" #Diffused a rebellion by Baybar's grandsons at Kerak using only diplomacy.
	trait="brave"
	trait="education_martial_3" #Qalawun's most trusted general. Many campaigns including a vital role at Homs in 1281.
	trait="mamaluk"
	1260.1.1 = {
		birth="1260.1.1" #Was certainly older than this.
		employer="32933"
	}
	1279.1.1 = {
		employer="32936"
	}
	1290.11.30 = {
		death = {
			death_reason = death_dungeon #Tortured then executed by his rival the now Sultan Al-Ashraf. Vanilla error with reign dates.
			killer = 32937
		}
	}
}

	dynasty = 1000102201
	religion = ismaili
	culture = daylamite
	martial = 6       # Moderate - he fought when necessary but wasn't primarily a military leader
	diplomacy = 8     # Strong - made strategic alliances and political maneuvering 
	intrigue = 7      # Good - politically calculating and opportunistic
	stewardship = 7   # Solid - consolidated Buyid territories but empire declined under him
	trait = ambitious # His drive to expand power and take the title "Shahanshah" (King of Kings)
	trait = patient   # Waited for right opportunities like Fakhr al-Dawla's death to assert authority
	trait = content   # After establishing supremacy, seemed satisfied and didn't actively defend borders
	trait = cynical   # Politically calculating, made strategic alliances based on self-interest
	disallow_random_traits = yes

	name = "Musawir"
	dynasty = kurdish_al_bawazij
	religion = azariqa
	culture = kurdish

	martial = 13
	trait = education_stewardship_3
	trait = stubborn
	trait = gregarious
	trait = zealous
	trait = peasant_leader
	trait = organizer
	824.3.2 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	866.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			set_relation_rival = character:163132 #Musa ibn Bugha
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_perk = bellum_justum_perk } }
				add_perk = bellum_justum_perk
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_perk = parthian_tactics_perk } }
				add_perk = parthian_tactics_perk
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_perk = organized_retreat_perk } }
				add_perk = organized_retreat_perk
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_perk = hit_and_run_perk } }
				add_perk = hit_and_run_perk
			}
			spawn_army = {
				name = azariqa_fanatics
				levies = 500
				men_at_arms = {
					type = tawashi
					stacks = 1
				}
				men_at_arms = {
					type = mubarizun
					stacks = 1
				}
				men_at_arms = {
					type = onager
					stacks = 1
				}
				location = province:4803
				origin = province:4803
				inheritable = yes
			}
			spawn_army = {
				name = azariqa_fanatics
				levies = 500
				men_at_arms = {
					type = tawashi
					stacks = 1
				}
				men_at_arms = {

					stacks = 1

1234862 = {
	name="Musawir"
	dynasty=1000124392
	diplomacy=7
	martial=7
	religion="azariqa"
	culture="levantine"
	trait="education_martial_2"
	trait="diligent"
	trait="brave"
	trait="ambitious"
	trait="unyielding_defender"
	father=1234863
	821.1.1 = {
		birth=yes
	}
	866.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			set_relation_rival = character:163132 #Musa ibn Bugha
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_perk = bellum_justum_perk } }
				add_perk = bellum_justum_perk
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_perk = parthian_tactics_perk } }
				add_perk = parthian_tactics_perk
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_perk = organized_retreat_perk } }
				add_perk = organized_retreat_perk
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_perk = hit_and_run_perk } }
				add_perk = hit_and_run_perk
			}
			spawn_army = {
				name = azariqa_fanatics
				levies = 500
				men_at_arms = {
					type = tawashi
					stacks = 1
				}
				men_at_arms = {
					type = mubarizun
					stacks = 1
				}
				men_at_arms = {

1230611 = {
	name="Nasr"
	dynasty_house = house_samanid #Samanid
	religion="maturidi"
	culture="tajik"
	martial = 5        # Moderate - relied on capable generals rather than personal military leadership
	diplomacy = 7      # Good political management, maintained complex relationships
	intrigue = 6       # Moderate political skills, but was perhaps too trusting
	stewardship = 9    # Excellent administrator, golden age of Samanid bureaucracy
	learning = 11      # High - great patron of scholars, turned court into cultural center
	trait = scholar    # His famous patronage of learning and transformation of Bukhara into intellectual center
	trait = trusting   # His openness to new ideas and reliance on ministers, ultimately led to conspiracy against him
	trait = patient    # Methodically built Samanid power, dealt with numerous early rebellions calmly
	trait = curious    # His intellectual openness, attraction of scholars from many places, conversion to Ismaili Islam
	trait = administrator  # His excellent organizational skills that strengthened Samanid administration
	father = 1230610
	902.1.1={
		birth="902.1.1"
	}
	936.1.1 = {
		set_primary_title_to = title:k_transoxiana
	}
	942.1.1 = {
		add_trait = consumption    # His tuberculosis that eventually killed him, began withdrawing from public life
	}
	943.6.4={
		death = yes
	}
}

	diplomacy = 8      # His diplomatic gifts to foreign rulers and political survival skills
	intrigue = 7       # 77-year political survival in turbulent Yemen requires excellent intrigue
	stewardship = 10   # Exceptional administrator - royal revenues reached a million gold dinars by 976
	trait = patient    # Managing a 77-year reign through constant turmoil requires extraordinary patience
	trait = diligent   # His consistent administrative success and long-term territorial management

188740 = {
	name = "Abdallah"
	dynasty = 1042165 #Ziyadid
	religion = "ashari"
	culture = "yemeni"
	martial = 3        # Low - the dynasty was militarily weak during this period
	diplomacy = 6      # Moderate - maintained some political relationships
	intrigue = 4       # Low - allowed slave-viziers to gain too much power
	stewardship = 5    # Poor - presided over territorial and economic losses
	trait = content    # Accepted the reduced circumstances of his dynasty rather than fighting to reclaim power
	trait = trusting   # Allowed Ethiopian slave-viziers to gradually take over effective governance
	trait = lazy       # Failed to take active steps to restore Ziyadid power during the decline
	father = 188739
	935.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	989.1.1 = {
		add_trait = craven    # Added when Zabid was captured and burned - his passive response to this crisis
	}

	}
